title: EnAyitO I janake
sahitya:
EnAyitO I janake maunavanu hiDidu maretaru hariya


caraNam 1    nAlige muridito neggina kone muLLu bAlakatanadali bhUta hiDiyido 
mEle kaugina tuTi eraDu ondAyito kAla mrtyuvu bandu gangeDisido
    caraNam 2    ghaTa sarpa kacci viSa ghanavAgi EritO kaTakarisi nAlige kaDidhOyitO 
haTadalli hariyannu neneyade iruvantha kuTila cancala manasu kUDi bAdhisito
    caraNam 3    hariyendarivara shira haridu tA bILuvude harinAma haNeyalli baredillave 
varada purandara viTTalarAyanna smarisidare siDileragi kolluvude
